name: Paramveer Kaur
title: Android Application Developer
summary: I am a dedicated Android Application Developer with a strong foundation in mobile application development. I have a proven track record of delivering high-quality applications that are both functional and visually appealing. My goal is to leverage my skills to create applications that solve real-world problems and provide exceptional user experiences.

responsibilities: Responsible for monitoring and coordinating the production workflow in the warehouse,
ensuring efficient operations and timely delivery of products.
Provided exceptional customer service by addressing inquiries,
resolving issues, and ensuring customer satisfaction in a fast-paced environment.
Responsible for providing support for solving technical issues.
Resolving network issues.
Communicate with users experiencing difficulties to determine and document problems experienced.
Responsible for providing support in the sales department.
Reviewed support cases for technical and troubleshooting accuracy and identified needed
process improvements.
Assisted customers with various types of technical issues via email, live chat and telephone.

TechStack: Android SDK, Java, Kotlin, GitHub, Firebase, Android Studio
responsibilities: Designed and developed Android applications using Java and Kotlin.
Implemented user interfaces and ensured optimal performance across various Android devices.
Developed and maintained Android applications using Java and Kotlin.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Participated in code reviews and contributed to team knowledge sharing.

TechStack: Eclipse,Android SDK, Java, Kotlin, GitHub, Firebase, Android Studio
responsibilities: Optimized UI and code for efficiency, reusability, and performance.
Studied new opportunities for mobile applications.

working primarily in Research and Development as a beginner.
